titles.title: A bill to transfer the Coast Guard cutter "INGHAM" to the Naval and Marine Museum at Patriots Point, South Carolina.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Hearings held in conjunction with the National Ocean Policy Study.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 100-554.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1009.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

bill.summary: 5/18/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to transfer the Coast Guard vessel "Ingham" to the Naval and Maritime Museum at Patriots Point, South Carolina.
